title: A vector-host epidemic model with spatial structure and seasonality
abstract:
Recently, Li and Zhao [5] (Bull. Math. Biol., 83(5), 43, 25 pp (2021))
proposed and studied a periodic reaction-diffusion model of Zika virus with
seasonality and spatial heterogeneous structure in host and vector populations.
They found the basic reproduction ratio R0, which is a threshold parameter. In
this short paper we shall use the upper and lower solutions method to study the
model of [5] with Neumann boundary conditions replaced by general boundary
conditions.
